![Screenshot of Choco Toast Notifications (Hook)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/master/choco-toast-notifications.hook/choco-toast-notifications.hook_screenshot.png)

### **Choco Toast Notifications Hook** is a Chocolatey hook that displays a toast notification after installing, uninstalling, or upgrading a package.

### Sound vaguely familiar? This hook supersedes, replaces, and expands upon my [Chocolatey Toast Notifications Extension](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/chocolatey-toast-notifications.extension). **Chocolatey Toast Notifications Hook** is even better than the extension as it works with ALL packages no matter if they have a program installer or not. **Chocolatey Toast Notifications Hook** also determines the difference between installs and upgrades and reports such. It's pretty and Chocotastic!

### PURPOSE:

* Chocogeeky fun!

### FEATURES: 
* **Choco Toast Notifications Hook** will display a toast notification with the package name, program name, version, status message (installed, uninstalled, or upgraded), and a link to the package page on the chocolatey.org website after a package is installed, uninstalled, or upgraded.

### WHAT IT WON'T DO:
* **Choco Toast Notifications Hook** will NOT work on anything other than Windows 10 and 11, this is a limitation of the [BurntToast](https://github.com/Windos/BurntToast) PowerShell module and its use of the [UWP Community Toolkit](https://github.com/Microsoft/WindowsCommunityToolkit).
